news.title: Big Tech sees over $1 trillion wiped from stocks as fears of AI bubble ignite sell-off
news.summary: Fears over AI spending have sparked a sell-off among tech stocks. Tech stocks have been hit by fears over spending on artificial intelligence.

news.title: Stellantis CEO says automaker is stronger together amid $26 billion restructuring
news.summary: The automaker announced $26 billion in charges from a business restructuring. It includes pulling back on electrification plans and reintroducing V8 engines.

news.title: Goldman Sachs is tapping Anthropic’s AI model to automate accounting, compliance roles
news.summary: Goldman Sachs is building AI agents with Anthropic’s Claude to automate trade accounting and client onboarding. The aim is to speed work and boost efficiency.

news.title: Bitcoin narrowly avoids falling under $60,000 as it bounces off lows
news.summary: Some market analysts have suggested bitcoin could fall further, potentially hitting between $40,000 to $50,000. Some market analysts suggest bitcoin could drop to as low as $30,000 in the coming days.

news.title: Google and Microsoft offer lucrative deals to promote AI, but even $500,000 won't sway some creators
news.summary: Tech companies are paying influencers hundreds of thousands of dollars to promote AI products. Tech companies including Google and Microsoft pay influencers to promote their products.

news.title: Bitcoin attempts a recovery, but still headed for the worst week since 2022
news.summary: Bitcoin rebounded from a dramatic selloff on Thursday, with investors hoping the worst might be over. Bitcoin is now trading at $16,000, down from $17,000 on Thursday.

news.title: Under Armour turns a surprise profit, even as turnaround plan costs keep rising
news.summary: Under Armour’s stock rallies toward a six-month high, after the athletic gear seller reported a surprise quarterly profit and raised its full-year outlook.

news.title: A tech wreck has rattled markets. Why this battered S&P 500 sector could be primed for a bounce.
news.summary: A popular software ETF is now at extremely oversold levels, according to one measure. A popular softwareETF is nowAt extremely oversell levels, says one measure of its value.

news.title: Super Bowl LX is turning into AI’s coming-out party
news.summary: Football's biggest event is even being powered by AI technology. It's not just about the OpenAI and Anthropic game-day ads.

news.title: Buy the dip! Your guacamole for Super Bowl Sunday is the cheapest it’s been in decades — and chip prices are down, too.
news.summary: PepsiCo is lowering prices for some snacks. A bumper crop of avocados and PepsiCo are the MVPs of this year's Super Bowl.
